title: My Milk Conspiracies Brings All the Boys to the Yard (with Curtis Cook)
itunes:title: My Milk Conspiracies Brings All the Boys to the Yard (with Curtis Cook)
description:
Are white people purposely making milk and dairy products more dangerous for people of color? Langston and David shoot the cheese breeze with Curtis Cook (Hulu's This Fool) to explore the startling truths about dairy and dairy farming. We all get sad for the cows and the children.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Are white people purposely making milk and dairy products more dangerous for people of color? Langston and David shoot the cheese breeze with Curtis Cook (Hulu's This Fool) to explore the startling truths about dairy and dairy farming. We all get sad for the cows and the children.

itunes:keywords: Langston Kerman, David Gborie, Curtis Cook, Hulu, Hulu's This Fool, American Dad, Milk Industry, Dairy Industry, Hormones in Dairy Products, Dairy Farming, Prison Industrial Complex, Prison Labor, Milk Lobbyists, Jewish Stomachs, Mountain Dew, Midwest Milk Obsession, Milk Craze, Got Milk, Milk 90s, WIC Program, Free School Lunch
